title: Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
description: Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
OB: When starting BIRT 2.0 RC2 and creating a project, importing the attached two designs into the project, and opening the Product Catalog. After that, clicking on the Preview button on the toolbar to see the report. Closing the viewer after viewing the report.
EB: After following the steps mentioned above, the preview from the toolbar should show the report that was last opened instead of always showing the first report opened in the session.
SR: Open BIRT 2.0 RC2, create a project and import the attached two designs into the project. Open the Product Catalog and then click on the Preview button on the toolbar to see the report. Once you have viewed the report, close the viewer and verify that the next time you click on the Preview button, it displays the last opened report instead of always showing the first report opened in the session.
